text: Anatoly Smiranin () was a Soviet actor. People's Artist of the Georgian SSR. == Selected filmography == * 1944 — The Last Hill * 1946 — Robinzon Kruzo * 1961 — Amphibian Man * 1966 — The Game Without Draw ==References== == External links == * Анатолий Смиранин on kino-teatr.ru * Category:Soviet male film actors Category:1892 births Category:1971 deaths
title: Anatoly Smiranin
